resources.string: Choose the number that is higher.\nQuestions can be repeated until you get 20 points.

"Congratulations, level completed!\n Did you know that the number 7 is considered the luckiest number. There are 7 days of the week, 7 continents, 7 colors of the rainbow, 7 musical notes and much more. Also, the number 7 is the favorite number of most people in the world."
"Choose the Roman numeral that is greater.\nQuestions can be repeated until you get 20 points."
"Congratulations, the level is completed!\n Did you know that there is no zero in Roman numerals?"
"Choose the fraction that is larger.\nQuestions can be repeated until you get 20 points."
"Congratulations, the level is completed!\n Operations with fractions in the Middle Ages were considered the most difficult area of mathematics"
Choose something comfortable.\nQuestions can be repeated until you get 20 points.
"Congratulations, the level is completed!\n Many crocodiles swallow stones. But not because they find them edible. Stones help them dive into the water faster and stay on the bottom."
